title: Performance and mechanism of U(VI) removal from solution by humic acid-coated Fe3O4 nanoparticle-modified biochar from filamentous green algae
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20646-20655
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03421J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mingyang Shen, Weisheng Dai, Muqing Qiu, Baowei Hu
The adsorbent material of humic acid-coated Fe3O4 nanoparticles modified biochar from filamentous green algae were fabricated using the co-precipitation method and applied for U(VI) elimination.
